alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 11 at 3:12AM CST until February 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, south central and southeast South Dakota, northwest Iowa and southwest Minnesota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation and the Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered snow showers will be possible this morning. Any snow showers, combined with the strong winds, could briefly drop visibility below a mile at times.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
